metadata.synopsis: Baelan, a mushroom hunter,  is surrounded by dangeous Bibberbang mushrooms. He was trying to get to the Noblestalk mushroom, but one of the stone ledges collapsed underneath him and he fell down. His partner Derryth (Dwarven Alchemist) is in the Myconid Village. Important: Baelan seems to have trouble keeping his train of thought - he loses track of his responses, changes the subject and generally seems out of sorts at times. Later, it will be confirmed that he's been suffering from a dementia-like condition for some years now.

99.speaker: Player
99.text: She and I had... an altercation.

47.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
47.context: NodeContext: Reacting to the player saying they killed his wife. Combat ensues afterwards.

86.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
86.context: NodeContext: Reacting to the player saying they killed his wife. Combat ensues afterwards.

154.speaker: Player
154.text: I killed her. And I enjoyed every moment of it.

28.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
28.context: NodeContext: Reacting to the player saying they killed his wife. Combat ensues afterwards.

7.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
7.context: NodeContext: In a loud, panicked whisper.

26.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
26.text: Can't be too careful in these parts. Bibberbang's the least of it.

35.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
35.context: NodeContext: Baelen's been saved. He seems amiable but less than clear in his thoughts.

79.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
79.text: Next time - more careful next time. For certain. Thank you - for your help.
79.context: NodeContext: Serious. He's daring the player to disagree.

107.speaker: Player
107.text: I'm glad I found you when I did.

116.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
116.text: Me too. But - noblestalk. You... you have it?

13.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
13.text: Or - no. Derryth - she's got it. Yes. Right.

97.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
97.text: Someone's got to look after Derryth.

41.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
41.context: NodeContext: Lost his train of thought.

83.speaker: Player
83.text: How did you wind up trapped like that?

155.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
155.text: Noblestalk. Yes, Derryth needs noblestalk. Mushroom. Good stuff.

69.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
69.text: And the ledge... yes, I was on a ledge - crumbled to bits. And I tumbled down.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: You must be keen on mushrooms if you're willing to brave the Underdark for them.

63.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
63.text: The shop! The shop needs all we find. Bonecloak's. Baldur's Gate.
63.context: NodeContext: He says 'the shop!' as if he's just remembered it exists.

104.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
104.text: Anything from - anything sourced here - very high rate of profit.

75.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
75.text: Mushroom. Powerful. Derryth wants it for a brew.

22.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
22.text: She's very good, my Derryth. Very good at a brew.

57.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
57.text: Wasteful. Very wasteful. What's done is - that is - it's done.

85.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
85.text: Derryth wants it very badly. Very, very badly indeed.

117.speaker: Player
117.text: Take the noblestalk and eat it. It'll make you feel better.

91.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
91.text: Help me? My - yes, my mind isn't what it used to be.

90.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
90.text: I could run the shop again. That is - help Derryth.
90.context: CinematicNodeContext: He pauses, and takes a bite of the Noblestalk.

132.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
132.context: NodeContext: Discomfort as the mushroom takes effect.

76.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
76.text: Oh - very glad. She'll be very glad.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: Are you feeling all right? Seems like you get confused easily.

142.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
142.text: My, erm - my words get away from me. You'll have to ask Derryth. She knows the ins and outs.
142.context: NodeContext: A little self-awareness beneath his confusion.

115.speaker: Player
115.text: How did you get trapped to begin with?

12.speaker: Player
12.text: You must be a rare breed of fool to go wandering amongst bibberbang.

54.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
54.text: Heh. You may be right. And worse - yes, worse by the day.
54.context: CinematicNodeContext: Taps head. He knows his mind is leaving him.

65.speaker: Player
65.text: Give him the noblestalk to eat. It'll help clear his mind.

49.speaker: Player
49.text: I changed my mind - I'll get your pack.

62.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
62.context: NodeContext: In a loud, panicked whisper.

48.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
48.context: CinematicNodeContext: Motions to the mushrooms surrounding him, then mimes 'blowing up'.NodeContext: A warning of nearby danger

37.speaker: Narrator
37.text: *You recognise the name - bibberbang, a mushroom that releases dangerous spores. Highly flammable.*

64.speaker: Player
64.text: This is quite a predicament you've landed yourself in.

15.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
15.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

78.speaker: Player
78.text: Surely you can navigate around some fungi, can't you?

101.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
101.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

4.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
4.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

17.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
17.text: Scroll - escape! My bag! Please. I've dropped it - somewhere!
17.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

140.speaker: Player
140.text: I don't suppose you're Baelen, are you?

160.speaker: Player
160.text: Hold tight. I'll find your bag.

106.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player holds up bagNodeContext: Urgent/hopeful

119.speaker: Player
119.text: Throw the bag into the midst of the spores.

30.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
30.context: CinematicNodeContext: Dark Urge watching the mushrooms explode like fireworks, can be a shot of their face with lights before it cuts to the rest of the explosion in gameplay

139.speaker: Narrator
139.text: *The backpack misses the dwarf by a fair margin and lands in a clearing amongst the bibberbang.*
139.context: CinematicNodeContext: Backpack lands on the groundNodeContext: bib-er-bang

81.speaker: Player
81.text: This is your mess - figure it out yourself.

143.speaker: Player
143.text: Hold up a scroll of Misty Step.

172.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
172.context: CinematicNodeContext: Player tosses the scroll to Baelen, who *barely* manages to catch it.NodeContext: Yelps because he thinks he's about to drop the scroll.

73.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
73.text: Just have to... and then... here!
73.context: NodeContext: Talking to himself while he fiddles with the scroll.

32.speaker: Narrator
32.text: *The scroll misses the dwarf by a fair margin and lands in a clearing amongst the bibberbang.*

146.speaker: Player
146.text: I've changed my mind. I'll fetch your bag instead.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: Scrolls don't come cheap, you know.

165.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
165.text: I'll give you what I have if you get me out of here - please!

105.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
105.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a duergar/grey dwarf abandoning him to his fate.

11.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
11.text: I-I mean... I didn't mean that.
11.context: NodeContext: Backpedalling on his previous insult - he still needs help.

120.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
120.context: NodeContext: Reacting to a drow/dark elf abandoning him to his fate.

98.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
98.text: Wait! I - need... Derryth! My bag! I beg you!

150.speaker: Player
150.text: I'll do you a favour. I can sort out the bibberbang and take any pesky noblestalk off your hands.

6.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
6.text: Not got it yet! Got stuck here instead!

129.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
129.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

130.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
130.text: Stop - please! Don't move, just listen!
130.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

166.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
166.context: NodeContext: Urgent. He's basically standing in the middle of a mine field of sorts.

14.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
14.context: NodeContext: A warning of nearby danger

135.speaker: Narrator
135.text: *He's indeed surrounded by bibberbang - the spores of those mushrooms are both toxic and flammable.*

80.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
80.text: A scroll! There was a scroll in my pack. Please - I need it!

108.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
108.text: Gettin' outta here soon enough. Wouldn't have came here if I'd had my wits to work.

67.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
67.text: Thanks for your help. Stop by Bonecloak's if you're ever in Baldur's Gate.

169.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
169.text: I owe you for saving me from my old cow.

112.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
112.text: She should've come with me. I shouldn't have left her.

131.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
131.text: Magic! It... it doesn't work! How will I leave this place?
131.context: InternalNodeContext: Baelan is in an anti-magic auraNodeContext: Surprise/fear

167.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
167.text: Ah! Right as - what were you saying?

147.speaker: Player
147.text: What are you doing down here?

18.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
18.text: I was just looking for - Derryth! She's - she'll be worried sick!

133.speaker: Player
133.text: I went to quite some effort, helping you. The way I see it, you owe me.

42.speaker: Player
42.text: Hit your head or something? You seem more than a little confused.

29.speaker: Baelen Bonecloak
29.text: Fine, fine. My mind - not what it used to be.

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I met Derryth - she's waiting for you.
